name: Gloryseeker
screen_description: This Hero seeks glory by slaying only the most experienced foes.

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay 3 Tier 4+ unit of soldier+ rank in combat

reward_properties.name: Gloryseeker
reward_properties.screen_description: Non-hero units in army get Rank Slayer

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay a unit of soldier+ rank in combat

name: Dominator
screen_description: This Hero seeks to dominate others to bolster their own ranks.

ambitions.screen_description: Recruit or Raise a Tier IV+ unit after combat

reward_properties.name: Domination
reward_properties.screen_description: Grants a base 90% chance of inflicting Dominated on target enemy until the end of battle.

ambitions.screen_description: Recruit or raise units after combat

name: Prospector
screen_description: This Hero desires to become the wealthiest in the realm.

ambitions.screen_description: Govern a city with 100+gold income for 5 turns

reward_properties.name: Artisan Equipment
reward_properties.screen_description:
While army leader, all other units have:+10 Hit Points+10% damage



This hero costs +30 Gold Unit Upkeep.

name: Defender
screen_description: This Hero strives to defend their city and Empire.

ambitions.screen_description: Governed city has +40 Fortification health for 5 turns

reward_properties.name: Militarist
reward_properties.screen_description: While army leader, all Shield Units, Polearm Units, Shock Units, and Fighter Units in army gain:<bulletlist><bullet>+1 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

ambitions.screen_description: Win a battle in friendly territory
Win a combat as a defender

name: Elitist
screen_description: This Hero aims to prove their superiority to others.

ambitions.screen_description: Reach level 12

reward_properties.name: Ruler's Retinue
reward_properties.screen_description: If this hero is in the same battle as your Ruler, this hero and your Ruler have +1 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink> and +1 <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink>.

ambitions.screen_description: Fight alongside their Ruler

name: Raider
screen_description: This Hero thrives on the raiding of enemy territory.

ambitions.screen_description: win 2 combats in enemy territory

reward_properties.name: Raider
reward_properties.screen_description: Non-hero units in army get Fiery Arrows and Searing Blades upgrades

ambitions.screen_description: Pillage a province
Win a combat against an army with 200 less power

name: Necromancer
screen_description: WIP TEXT: Spooky Scary Skeletons

name: Instructor
screen_description: This Hero aims to lead the most experienced force in the world.

ambitions.screen_description: Hero leads a full army of legendary rank units for 3 turns

reward_properties.name: Trainer
reward_properties.screen_description: While army leader, all non-Hero units in army gain:<bulletlist><bullet>+2 <hyperlink><xp></xp> Experience</hyperlink> per turn.</bullet></bulletlist>

name: Martyr
screen_description: WIP TEXT: Chronic Victim Syndrome

name: Crusader
screen_description: This Hero vows to smite the wicked.

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay 2 undead or fiend or umbral demon unit of Tier 4+ in combat. Combat summons do not count.

reward_properties.name: Preacher
reward_properties.screen_description: While army leader, non-hero units in army have:<bulletlist><bullet>Faithful</bullet><bullet>Zeal</bullet></bulletlist>

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay an undead, fiend, or Umbral demon unit in combat. Combat summons do not count.

name: Duelist
screen_description: This Hero aspires to become an unrivaled duelist.

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay a level 5+ Ruler or Hero in combat

reward_properties.name: Duelist
reward_properties.screen_description: Against Heroes, this unit:<bulletlist><bullet>Deals +30% damage.</bullet><bullet>Has +2 <defense></defense> <hyperlink>Defense</hyperlink> and <resistance></resistance> <hyperlink>Resistance</hyperlink>.</bullet></bulletlist>

ambitions.screen_description: Personally slay a Hero in combat

name: Shepherd
screen_description: This Hero strives to nurture the next generation and lead them onward.
